label: My Website Portfolio
description: Ta-da! It's me, distilled into pixels and packaged neatly in a nutshell. And guess what? You're already here, exploring my digital world!

label: Wordle Clone
description: I just love this game, so I re-created it from scratch. If you've already conquered the original game today and are craving some more daily word-guessing excitement, then look no further! Happy guessing!

label: Click Tiles
description: A fun little project where I try out some cool animations on a responsive grid of clickable tiles on top of different backgrounds. Check it out!
